name: Centrotel Hotel

reviews.text: When we ventured out for a walk to get our last moments of being in a different country and culture, before leaving early the next morning, we had no issues with the neighborhood. I did NOT feel unsafe; but as in any city, be aware of your surroundings and don't display a behavior that 'screams', "tourist".

reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: To a person who has lived a sheltered life, it may seem that the hotel is located in a run down neighbourhood; but in fact it is just a regular working suburb that is perfectly safe, and close to many amenities including a number of pharmacies, supermarket, cafes/bars/tavernas and good take away places.
reviews.title: Very comfortable room and friendly staffs

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can only confirm that our experience being in this hotel was great! The staff was really kind, the room with balcony clean and cosy. The breakfast was really enjoyable. Wifi connection free of charge in the room. Should we also state that we stayed in Athen exactly during the week-end when all the European flights had to be cancelled. The reception was kind enough to give us the possibility to stay 1 more night... and we got at the same time a free room upgrade! To our opinion, this is the best 3 stars hotel we booked for a very long time. Thne only minus point are the surroundings...
reviews.title: This 3 stars hotel is excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a great three days at this hotel. Our room was excellent - we did get a free upgrade - the staff extremely helpful, great breakfast, wifi + the use of two laptops, good selection of guidebooks, immaculately clean, basically I felt you wouldn't complain at twice the price. The only slight downside is the area - I did feel a little unsafe at night, and pickpockets are very active around Omonia Square and Victoria metro - take care!
reviews.title: Fantastic value and superb room.

reviews.text: Before I booked I checked as usual Tripadvisor. Finally I can confirm the very good comments of the travellers about the hotel. Good location in city center. 300m from Metro Victoria station and a bit more to Larissa Train station. Grocery are just 50m far away where you find anything you need. The room was nice, bright and clean with a small balcony. I felt comfortable and cozy in the room. Breakfast is 10 EUR (see pic). Due to the Volcano issue I was forced to stay 2 days longer and I like to say a big THANK YOU for the hotel staff who made it easy and with no additional cost possible to extend my stay at the hotel. Great service! I would come again and would recommend this hotel. Oh I forget to mention the fast FREE WIFI !!!
reviews.title: Very good hotel in city center...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed twice at this hotel and we will certainly come back next time we are in Greece. The rooms were excellent and the staff very pleasant and helpful. The area was also fine just 10 minutes by tube from the noisy centre of town. Highly recommended if you want to relax! Urbano (Spain)
reviews.title: Great place, great staff, great value!

reviews.text: I booked Centrotel because of the positive Tripadvisor reviews, and I have not been disappointed at all.
reviews.title: Perfect choice

description: A newly built hotel, Centrotel offers 50 guest rooms and suites. All of the rooms are spacious, well furnished and modern in design. Each room is fully equipped with a range of modern facilities including satellite TV and hydro-massage bath, as well as a private balcony. The hotel is located just 2 stops on the Metro from the Acropolis and the Plaka area of Athens. Syntagma Square is just 2km from the hotel.
